short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add feedback with reactions and comments to your presentations over any tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add live reactions and comments to your presentations!

Get real-time feedback as you present and allow the audience to ask questions as you go!

Let the audience participate by scanning a QR code and allowing them to react to the content or send comments. You decide when you address these comments!

At the end of your presentation, you get a rundown on what the audience thought!
